name: Geothermal Resource Group
tag_list: energy-engineering, energy-exploration, well-drilling, alternative-energy, drilling-companies, drilling-rigs, energy-management, geothermal-contractors, geothermal-drilling, geothermal-energy
overview:
GRGI provides complete cost-effective solutions for your energy engineering needs.

Geothermal Resource Group Inc. - From geothermal energy exploration to heat pump installations, GRGI provides complete cost-effective solutions for your energy engineering needs. . We minimize the cost of well drilling through proactive, 24/7, hands-on support. With over 30 years of experience, GRGI can initiate, complete, and operate projects more efficiently. Contact us today to learn more about how you can take advantage of geothermal energy to meet your energy demands.
